etymology.description: 亼 (mouth) + 皀 (bowl of rice on a stand) = bowl with stand

examples.pinyin: Wǒ yòng jí lái chéng tāng.
examples.english: I use the bowl with stand to serve soup.

examples.chinese: 他买了一个𠊊(𠊊)，来装热汤(來裝熱湯)。
examples.pinyin: Tā mǎi le yīgè jí, lái zhuāng rè tāng.
examples.english: He bought a bowl with stand to hold hot soup.

examples.chinese: 古人常以𠊊(𠊊)为器(為器)，供祭祀之用(供祭祀之用)。
examples.pinyin: Gǔrén cháng yǐ jí wéi qì, gòng jìsì zhī yòng.
examples.english: Ancients often used the bowl with stand as an instrument for sacrificial ceremonies.
